page.title: 13INFANT SCHOOL -FINDING OUT 1
page.content:
We discovered that most children come to school on foot, so it would seem that they do not live very far. Most children come to school with their friends though many come by themselves. Most also come with an adult relation. Most children in our school leave for school between 8.30 am and 9.00 am.
We did a survey about the people who came to our class and found out that most people live in houses; most people still have their milk delivered by the milkman and most of our mums do not work in the daytime.
